eemont.image.scaleAndOffset¶

eemont.image.scaleAndOffset(self)[source]¶

Scales bands on an image according to their scale and offset parameters.

Tip

Check more info about the supported platforms and image scaling the User Guide.

Parameters

self (ee.Image [this]) – Image to scale.

Returns

Scaled image.

Return type

ee.Image

Examples

>>> import ee, eemont
>>> ee.Authenticate()
>>> ee.Initialize()
>>> S2 = ee.ImageCollection('COPERNICUS/S2_SR').first().scaleAndOffset()
eemont.image.scale eemont.image.spectralIndices
